Package com.atakmap.android.image.nitf.overlays

Class Overlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.image.nitf.overlays.Overlay
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleOverlay, EllipseOverlay, FreeformOverlay, LabelOverlay, LineOverlay, RectangleOverlay
    public abstract class Overlay
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stores the data needed to represent an overlay
